EmailTemplate.name: Case Reassignment
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Reassignment: {!ClientCase__c.ClientCaseName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear [Counselor Name],
This email is to inform you that the case "[Case Name]" has been assigned to you, effective [Date].
This is a reassignment.
Case Details:
Client Name: [Client Name]
Reason for Seeking Assistance: [Brief description of client needs]
Briefly explain the reason for the reassignment.
Action Required:
Please review the case status, pending steps and contact the client to schedule follow-up meeting at your earliest convenience.
Sincerely,
The [Housing Agency Name] Team
